defenseActions.name: Block
defenseActions.description: Raise your shield to reduce incoming damage by 50% plus your shield's defense bonus
defenseActions.flavorText: You brace behind your shield, absorbing the impact.

defenseActions.name: Dodge
defenseActions.description: Attempt to completely avoid an incoming attack using agility
defenseActions.flavorText: You twist aside, letting the attack pass harmlessly by.

defenseActions.name: Parry
defenseActions.description: Deflect an attack with your weapon and deliver a swift counter-attack
defenseActions.flavorText: You deftly deflect the blow and riposte with a swift counter.
